attributes.additional_details:
Once again the clocks have changed and we have major accidents and deat on the roads.
I used to be for the farmers, but they do not need it for the light any more and now the exuse is the children will have to walk home in the dark, when most get picked up by there parents.
The changing of time messes with your internal clock
and causes adverse tiredness and then you have the demestic pets who do not know why they have to wait the extra hour to go out.
So stop messing with time and save lives.
